channel.title: Course Introduction - 2022-2023 :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script [Slide 1] Hello and welcome to the Computational Core Trial Course! My name is Russ Feldhausen, and Iâ€™ll be one of the instructors for this program. My contact information is shown here, and is also listed on the syllabus [Slide 2] There are many other instructors and TAs for this program that you may interact with or see in the tutorial videos. They all have been instrumental in the development of this program.
